```{r, include = FALSE}
packages = c("raster", "sf", "clock", "tmap",
             "tidyverse", "rgdal", "htmlwidgets", "leaflet",
             "geosphere")

for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p,character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
